summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5696 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 4, Gardner J. Gwinn Addition, being the alley between Roosevelt Way and 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 78th Street to East 80th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75310, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
